column1: Regular traffic reports will resume Wednesday March 31 at 6:30 a.m.

column3: I-64E at 59 MM in Franklin Co:
column4: The roadway is shutdown just east of the US-60 exit until further notice due to a serious collision.
Wednesday March 31 thru Saturday April 3 at Rupp Arena.
Use added caution and watch for pedestrians especially in the downtown area.
